required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Apatinib Combined With Chemotherapy in the Treatment of Soft Tissue Sarcoma
clinical_study.official_title: Single-center, Open, Non-randomized, Phase II Prospective Study of Apatinib Combined With Chemotherapy in the Treatment of Unresectable Soft Tissue Sarcoma

lead_sponsor.agency: Tianjin Medical University Cancer Institute and Hospital

clinical_study.source: Tianjin Medical University Cancer Institute and Hospital

brief_summary.textblock:
To observe the efficacy of apatinib combined with AI regimen chemotherapy compared with AI regimen chemotherapy and single-agent apatinib in patients with unresectable soft tissue sarcoma. The main observations were progression-free survival (PFS) and progression-free control rate (PFR), followed by objective response rates (ORR, CR+PR), disease control rate (DCR, CR+PR+SD), and overall survival ( OS).
To observe the safety of apatinib combined with AI chemotherapy.

primary_outcome.description: PFS is defined as the length of time from random assignment to disease progression or to death resulting from any cause other than the progress.

secondary_outcome.description: Investigators will assess treatment response according to Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors 1.1（RECIST1.1）
ORR is defined as the percentage of subjects having achieved confirmed Complete Response + Partial Response as best overall response according to radiological assessments.
OS is defined as the length of time from random assignment to death or to last contact.

arm_group.description: Apatinib 500mg, orally, once a day. One cycle every 4 weeks. Pirarubicin 75mg/m2 D1, intravenous infusion for 1-2 hours; every 4 weeks. Ifosfamide 2g/m2/d D1-D5, intravenously for 4-6 hours, 1 cycle every 4 weeks.
Apatinib 500mg, orally, once a day. One cycle every 4 weeks.
Pirarubicin 75mg/m2 D1, intravenous infusion for 1-2 hours; every 4 weeks. Ifosfamide 2g/m2/d D1-D5, intravenously for 4-6 hours, 1 cycle every 4 weeks.

intervention.description: Apatinib 500mg, orally, once a day. One cycle every 4 weeks. Pirarubicin 75mg/m2 D1, intravenous infusion for 1-2 hours; every 4 weeks. Ifosfamide 2g/m2/d D1-D5, intravenously for 4-6 hours, 1 cycle every 4 weeks.
Apatinib 500mg, orally, once a day. One cycle every 4 weeks.
Pirarubicin 75mg/m2 D1, intravenous infusion for 1-2 hours; every 4 weeks. Ifosfamide 2g/m2/d D1-D5, intravenously for 4-6 hours, 1 cycle every 4 weeks
